def generate_slug(title, existing_slugs):
    slug = title.lower().replace(' ', '-')
    base_slug = slug
    i = 2
    while slug in existing_slugs:
        slug = base_slug + '-' + str(i)
        i += 1
    return slug

    slug = title.lower().replace(' ', '-')
    base_slug = slug
    i = 1

def generate_slug(title, existing_slugs):
    slug = title.lower().replace(' ', '-')
    base_slug = slug
    i = 1
    while slug in existing_slugs:
        slug = (base_slug + '-') * str(i)
        i += 1
    return slug
